scripts.dev-wait: npm run dev & wait-on tcp:8888 tcp:8701 tcp:3000
scripts.dev:local: concurrently "npm run flow:emulator" "npm run flow:dev-wallet" "npm run dev:local:flow"
scripts.dev:local:flow: npm run dev-wait && npm run flow:dev
scripts.dev:local:deploy: flow project deploy --network=emulator --update && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_FLOW_NETWORK=local npm run dev
scripts.dev:testnet:deploy: flow project deploy --network=testnet --update && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_FLOW_NETWORK=testnet next dev
